person.persName: John G. Hart (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and magistrate)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and magistrate. Kentucky native. Son of John Hart. Married to Elizabeth Moreland Hart in Bath County, Kentucky, on October 7, 1826. Father of Mary L. Hart. Married Rebecca Stephens Hart. Father of Martha Hart, Nancy Hart, and Susan Hart. Farmer in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Employed John M. Schultz as a farmhand in 1860. Elected magistrate in 1862.
